action.name: Multiattack
entries: The centaur makes two attacks, using Forest Staff or Sun Ray in any combination.

action.name: Forest Staff
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Sun Ray
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 90 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the start of the centaur's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The centaur casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
